rdf:Description.dc:title: Report to the ministers : Clean Air Strategy for Alberta 1991 Clean Air Strategy for Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Alberta Energy.
Alberta. Alberta Environment.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: Edmonton, AB : Alberta Energy ; Alberta Environment,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Identifies and clarifies the most important issues regarding energy-related emissions and outlines practical and achievable actions that can be taken by consumers and producers to address present and emerging air quality problems. Development of this Clean Air Strategy for Alberta was guided by pubic discussion and involvement.

Identifies and clarifies the most important issues regarding energy-related emissions and outlines practical and achievable actions that can be taken by consumers and producers to address present and emerging air quality problems. Development of this Clean Air Strategy for Alberta was guided by public discussion and involvement.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Air quality management
Air quality management
Fossil fuels
Environmental policy
